meanings.definition: To make a woman feel special or desired.
meanings.sent1: He womanized his wife by surprising her with flowers.
meanings.sent2: She womanized her best friend by listening to her problems.
meanings.sent3: The gentleman womanized the lady by offering his seat on the bus.
meanings.sent4: Her smile womanized the room, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture womanized the atmosphere, spreading warmth and joy.

meanings.definition: To engage in relationships with multiple women.
meanings.sent1: He womanized around town, dating different ladies each week.
meanings.sent2: She womanized during college, exploring various romantic connections.
meanings.sent3: The bachelor womanized his way through the party, charming every guest.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a womanizer preceded him, causing whispers among friends.
meanings.sent5: The player's womanizing ways caught up with him, leading to heartbreak and regret.

meanings.definition: To treat women as objects for sexual gratification.
meanings.sent1: He womanized the women at the bar, only interested in their looks.
meanings.sent2: She felt objectified when he womanized her at the office party.
meanings.sent3: The disrespectful man womanized every woman he met, showing no respect.
meanings.sent4: Her experience with a womanizer left her feeling used and unvalued.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villain as a womanizer, preying on vulnerable women.
